Java Barcelona

Conference by JUG Barcelona.
The first big Java and JVM conference in Spain.
Barcelona will be the host next 19th - 21st of June 2017.

2017 Edition

Past: 2015, 2016
ChangeLog JBCN 3.0:
- Venue 3.0: Capacity->400+;
- JBCN-TEAM++;
- Speakers++

3 days > 50 speakers 4 tracks > 400 attendees

Call for Papers


Do yo want to share your knowledge and experiences?
Join as a speaker in JBCNConf.
The call for papers will be open until 1st of May.

Submit Paper

Venkat Subramaniam

Keynote Speaker
He has trained and mentored thousands of software developers in the US, Canada, Europe, and Asia, and is a regularly-invited speaker at several international conferences.

proudly hosted by the Barcelona Java User Group

JBCN Conference: 19-21 June

Do not miss the opportunity to participate in this event to immerse yourself in 3-days interesting talks on Java, JVM and open-source technologies.
Talks will held from Monday 19th to Tuesday 20th & Workshops will run on Wednesday 21st until noon.

Speakers:

Venkat Subramaniam

Founder of Agile Developer, Inc.

Sandro Mancuso

Founder of Codurance and London Software Craftmanship Community

Trisha Gee

Developer Advocate at JetBrains

Stay tunned, more great speakers will be announced soon!

Sponsors:

This is a priceless opportunity to participate in the first big Java and JVM conference in Spain, to promote your company and to support technological communities.

Code of conduct

Our conference is dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion (or lack thereof).

We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any conference venue, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.

Conference participants violating these rules may be sanctioned or expelled from the conference without a refund at the discretion of the conference organisers.

About Us

The Barcelona JUG is a nonprofit association with a great team and a broad experience in Java technologies.

Since 2012, Barcelona JUG is organizing talks and meetups focused on Java topics, looking forward to spin this technology from our hometown to the rest of the world.
